page.title: 15Local public services.
page.content: Nottinghamshire County Council and Newark District Council are responsible for most local services. Apart from the major ones included elsewhere,{refuse}in plastic sacks, is collected weekly and taken to Fiskerton tip. Electric{street {lighting}is poor except in areas of new development.{Road maintenance}and drainage are adequate but surfaces are somewhat patchy.{Verge and hedge {trimming}is only done annually. There is a fortnightly mobile{library service. The nearest{fire service}is at Southwell. Severn Trent Water Authority maintains the river bank, levee, pumped{water {supply}and{sewage}system and{works. Mains{electricity}is available throughout the area but there is no gas supply. Each village has a public {phone box}and daily{postal service.}
